posts.post_title: N172 cards - America's least cared about want list
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anonymous
Fred: This is all just a dream and none of this really exists. Think man, adults collecting old - timer baseball cards, come on now. Wake up, you are holding all of us here trapped in your dream. WAKE UP!

posts.post_title: N172 cards - America's least cared about want list
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Judge Dred (Fred)
Gil,

Thanks for the bump.  

You and John can say what you like but my therapist told me that I should believe in something and that I should stop believing in Santa Claus because he died a few decades ago.  I'll accept Santas departure from this earth but don't try and tell me that there isn't a Hutchison OJ card out there...  

Ok, maybe I thought I saw one a few years back, maybe it was the Lithium tablets...  I still gotta believe in something other than the fact that Bonds never juiced and he's going to legitimately break Aaron's HR record soon...

BUMP

PPS. I also need a Heckler and a Kilroy (and altho a Browning would be great, he too is not in the master plan). But these guys won't come cheaply.

Posted By: Judge Dred (Fred)
Paul,

This is a "stand-alone" auction.  I'm the only bidder and I get the only catalog.  Now, if you want to fill your N172 want list then you should create your own BST N172 thread.  Now scram!  [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG] 

The Hecker's mine as are the rest of the cards in that auction.  All I have to do is figure out how to pay for it all and to see if Barry does lay-away.

Edited to add:

By the way Barry, November is a long time from now.  Can you bump it up a month (or two)?
